_sText:
Romans 10:9
James 1:2-4

Map Name: aim_flashlight
Author: Dan Jack 
Alias: [REG-S] Black Hawk
Site: BH-Source.com

Email me at Jackster006@hotmail.com if you have questions/comments.
Also if you see any errors on my map or any suggestions on making it
better, send me an E-mail... a picture of the error would be great too.

This map is my first official map. So it's possible that I'll make a new version of this.

Special Thanks:	
- To all sites that host my map.
- The best clan in the world, KORT!
- God and my friends and family

Tips and Fun:

1.  For best results turn your gamma 
     all the way up. To do this click 
     "options" "video" "adjust brightness levels"
2.  Wanna have fun with the gravity?
     Type (sv_gravity 100)in console
     (you must have admin to do this 
     or create your own server)
3.  The original idea was to make a 
     map where you would have to use 
     the flashlight to play... you don't 
     have to in the map, but it could 
     help in some areas.
4.  Some objects are not bullet proof.


INSTALLATION: 

You must extract both aim_flashlight.bsp, aim_flashlight.res and aim_flashlight.txt to:

C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\<YOUR STEAM ACCOUNT>\counter-strike source\maps

If you are hosting this map on a server please make sure all three first are installed correctly.

Enjoy.
